text: is a Japanese television jidaigeki or period drama that was broadcast in 1987. It is the 28th in the Hissatsu series. ==Cast== * Makoto Fujita as Mondo Nakamura * Hiroaki Murakami as Masa * Tomokazu Miura as Kagetarō * Kazuko Kato as Otama * Ken Nishida as Yoriki Onizuka * Toshio Yamauchi as Tanaka sama * Kin Sugai as Sen Nakamura * Mari Shiraki as Ritsu Nakamura ==References== Category:1987 Japanese television series debuts Category:1980s drama television series Category:Jidaigeki television series
title: Hissatsu Shigotonin V Fuunryūkohen
